source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_00<tab>Maerwynn has hatched a ridiculous plan to ensnare the dastardly Giggity.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_00<tab>十二神大聖堂のメルウィンは冒険者に情報を与えたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_01 This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Ceana in Aleport.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_01本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、エールポートの「シアーナ」から再受注してください。

※次のメインクエストは、「メインクエストガイド」からも確認することができます。メインクエストガイドの表示/非表示は、メインコマンドの「キャラクターコンフィグ」から「ユーザーインターフェース設定」を選び、変更してください。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_02<tab>After dealing the errant golem a right thrashing, you now find yourself in possession of a golem soulstone. However, in its current state, it will not serve as bait. In accordance with Maerwynn's instructions, you must journey to Amberscale Rock in the Central Shroud, and rub the soulstone against the giant concentration of amber in order to dispel the enchantments woven into the chunk of true heart ore.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_02<tab>このままでは十分ではない。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D1201 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E882201 /var>」をかざそう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_03<tab>Through a series of bizarre and rather random actions, you have obtained a chunk of true heart ore. Your new prize is being eyed hungrily by Tiggy the spriggan, who apparently followed you to Amberscale Rock. Explain your strategy to the spriggan before he attempts to devour your ore.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877001 /var>を入手した。鱗紋岩の「ティギー」と話してみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_04<tab>Tiggy is delighted to learn of your plans, and tells you that the ravenous Giggity is presently lurking within the Spriggan Dig. Make your way into the lair of the spriggans and use the true heart to lure out and slay Giggity.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_04<tab>これで、ゴギーをおびき寄せることができる。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D1301 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877001 /var>」を使い、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207BE01 /var>から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877101 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_05<tab>The furry inhabitants of the Spriggan Dig can at last breathe a collective sigh of relief, for the notorious Giggity has finally fallen. In a primal frenzy, you rip and tear open the spriggan's huge guts and claim the corrupted crystal nestled deep within. Present your prize to Hedyn so that he can confirm it is the crystal you seek.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_05<tab>やっと「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877101 /var>」を入手することができた。グリダニア：旧市街の「ヘディン」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_06<tab>Hedyn confirms that the foul-smelling, offal-laden crystal is comprised of ice-aspected aether. To your chagrin, you learn that you cannot cleanse the crystal of the spriggan entrails, as the thick coating of digestive juices is the only thing protecting you from the crystal's detrimental effects. Hopefully Cid will have developed a less irksome way to do the same...
target: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_SEQ_06<tab>ヘディンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877101 /var>を渡した。飛空艇「エンタープライズ」を改良するクリスタルが、ようやくそろったようだ。

エールポートのシアーナから再受注してください

エールポートのシアーナから再受注してください

TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TODO_02本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
エールポートのシアーナから再受注してください

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TODO_03<tab>Use the true heart to lure out the crystal bearer.<var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Ceana in Aleport.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TODO_03本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
エールポートのシアーナから再受注してください

target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TODO_04本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
エールポートのシアーナから再受注してください

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_MAERWYNN_000_000<tab>A chert golem was recently sighted near the gates to the Sylphlands. Who created it and why it was left free to roam is anyone's guess. In any case, the construct's presence is profoundly serendipitous, for the soulstone of a chert golem is created by enchanting a chunk of true heart ore. True heart, in case you were unaware, is an exceedingly rare ore, one which Giggity has almost certainly never tasted, and will therefore be unable to resist.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_MAERWYNN_000_000えーっと、のページは……これね。
の核である「」が、
この石でできているそうよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_MAERWYNN_000_001<tab>So, all you need do is search for the golem, slay it, claim its heart, and use it to bait the spriggan. Oh, and do remember to rub the soulstone against a sufficiently large concentration of amber, say, Amberscale Rock in the Central Shroud. Short of petitioning a mage versed in golem magicks, that is the only way I know to dispel the enchantments woven into a true heart. Eh? Why are you looking at me like that? I had relations with a thaumaturge once, if you must know.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_MAERWYNN_000_001でも、「」の輝きで浄化しないと元に戻せないみたい。
は、ラークスコールの泉付近で、
見つかるらしいから、どうしても欲しいなら行ってみるといいわ。
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TODO_000_010<tab>指定地点で待機し、popしたゴーレムを倒して「珠石」を入手
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TODO_000_020<tab>鮫肌岩に「珠石」を使い、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877001 /var>」を作る

TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TIGGY_000_030イシ、ヒカリ、カザス！
イイイシ、デキル、イシシ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TIGGY_000_035<tab>Ore!? Shiny ore! Ore, ore, ore! Ooooooooore!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TIGGY_000_035ヤタ！　イイイシ、デキタ！
イイイシ、ウマソウ！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TIGGY_000_036<tab>Tiggy ore!? Ah! Giggity ore! Friend stop Giggity! Giggity, Giggity, Giggityyyyyy!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TIGGY_000_036イイイシ、ティギーノオウチ、オク！
ゴギー、クル、ゼッタイ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TIGGY_000_037<tab>Giggity is home! Tiggy is afraid! Friend come home! Friend stop Giggity!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TIGGY_000_037オマエ、ゴギーノクリスタル、ホシイ。
ゴギー、ツヨイ、オマエ、モットツヨイ！
オマエ、ゴギー、ヤッツケレ！！
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_TODO_000_040<tab>巣窟の指定地点に、黒鮫肌石を置く大食いスプリガンがpopするので倒す→<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877101 /var>入手

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_050<tab>Ah! Pray do not sneak up on me like that. I was engrossed in─wait, what is that─<sniff> <sniff>─what is that gods-awful smell?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_050わわわ！　もう帰ってきたんですか……！？
もしや「」を……？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_051<tab>My word, that is a breathtakingly beautiful crystal. I see my supposition was not mistaken.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_051わ、わわわわ……ハイ！
素晴らしい、本当に手に入れてきたのですね！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_052<tab>Ugh... And I also see you weren't averse to digging through spriggan entrails for your prize.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_052う、うわぁ……。
……なんかこれ、スプリガンの体液で、
ぬっちょぬちょじゃないですか……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_053<tab>We owe our furry friend a debt of gratitude, you know. This thick coating of digestive juices is protecting us from the harmful effects of the crystal, just as the warded pot you once used did.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_053あ、でもこれが「絶霊体」のかわりになって、
エーテルの干渉から偏属性クリスタルを
保護していたようですね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_054<tab>Why so glum, friend? You've finally obtained the corrupted crystal you sought─one overflowing with <var 1A 02 /var>earth<var 1A 01 /var>-aspected aether!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_054……どれどれ。
やりましたです、ハイ！　
これはまさに「水属性を土属性に換えるクリスタル」です！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_055<tab>Calm down─I jest, I jest! It is comprised of <var 1A 02 /var>ice<var 1A 01 /var>-aspected aether, worry not. I suppose that joke was in poor taste, considering your previous two attempts were for naught...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC307_00974_HEDYN_000_055僕たち「零組」の後学のため、少しばかり分けて……。
い、いえいえ、冗談ですよ……ハイ。
